ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow... Is the shard really worth that much. A guild mate gave me one last night when i asked him what it did. (He had just /auctioned it).  He wanted my
ygData.messageBody:
Wow... Is the shard really worth that much. A guild
mate gave me one last night when i asked him what it
did. (He had just /auctioned it). He wanted my
dragoon dirk in trade which i gladly gave him. I KNEW
he was giving me a VERY GOOD deal and thanked him
profusely, but i didnt reallize how good of deal.

The goblins in high keep (all of them yellow and red)
keep resisting the proc. I have successfully proced
like 3 times in 4 hours. Is there anything I can do to
help this. I moved it to my primary hand and put PGT
in 2nd after about half an hour with not even seeing
it try to proc. (gave claws away that i had been using
in primary) Stats are --- Piercing 120, Duel Wield
130, AGI 118, DEX 112, INT 80

Harmonie Moonsong
Upon having once again accidently tried to chains a
guard, ACK... will i ever get 26... hehe
> > How much was the shard, if I may ask?
> >
> > I see them go for 1000p sometimes, but mabey that
> is just
> > a fluke?


=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
Bard of the 24th chorus
Bristlebane server
http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
